welcome_benefits: 2,500 EDGE Miles and Taj/ITC Hotel Vouchers Worth ₹10,000

Movie & Dining: 30% Discount Up to ₹1,000 on Dining With Axis Dining Delights. Buy One Get One Free on Movie and Non-Movie Ticket Bookings With BMS
Rewards Rate: 1 EDGE Mile/₹100 on Domestic and 2 EDGE Mile/₹100 on International Spends
Reward Redemption: Redeem on Travel Edge (1 EDGE Mile = 4 Partner Points)
Travel: Complimentary Priority Pass, Airport Transfer Service, and Concierge Services
International Lounge Access: Unlimited International Airport Lounge Access With Priority Pass

product_details: Axis Olympus is a super premium credit card with high rewards and a great point redemption program.
Cardholders can earn 2 EDGE Mile/₹100 on international and 1 EDGE Mile/₹100 on domestic spending.
This card offers frequent travelers unlimited international and domestic airport lounge access.
